website_summaries.verdict: These shin guards are a little longer than average, so they give your beginner a little more coverage.
pros: Ergonomic 3D design fits the curvature of the lower leg
Slightly longer than standard shin guards for better coverage
cons: Design and construction of the hook-and-loop closures could be better

customer_reviews.title: Nice shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Not top quality but I guess at the price I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Allen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5-year-old son's first soccer experience. He weighs about 43 pounds and is approximately 44 inches tall (3ft 8in). I just realized they're under his socks, but hopefully you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: TempestTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 7 year old son and they work great. He’s used them for 2 seasons so far and they have held up well. He didn’t like the Velcro straps on the back so we did cut them off. He prefers to wear his shin guards on the inside of his socks, instead of the outside. Because of this the Velcro would run the back of his leg. So it was his preference to cut the straps. For kids with a bit bigger legs they probably wouldn’t irritate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Woosley

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive protection
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive but they have held up to an entire soccer season's practices and games. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, straps are a little long.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off...the steps are a little long for smaller kids (mine is 5...and we just pull his socks down over the top, to keel them snug).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Use these for a 4 yr old, and a 5 yr old who started soccer. They are a little big but works.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob smith

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers - these are slightly taller than most shin guards to give a little more extra protection. Easy to put on and off and work perfectly over socks with the top of the socks pulled down over to hide them. My 4 and 6 year old can put these on and off themselves without any adult help - making it even easier to get ready for soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Dadvice TV - Kidney Health Coach

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine for my 9yr old who is a size 10/12 and they didnt break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for young soccer players- would have been good if velcros had longer surface areas
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well and as advertised. Satisfied with the purchase. The good thing about these is that kids can wear them in summer without the long soccer socks (especially in sunny hot days)!! Since these are for youths and young kids, would have been good if velcros had longer surface areas (longer velcros for easy attachment and secure fit, hence knocked off a star. I had to put extra velcros at the back to fit my son's leg size... otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: We wish the Velcro straps were a bit bigger, but otherwise a great fit for my 5 yr. old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great basic shin guard
customer_reviews.text: Good basic shin guard. My tall for his age 7-year-old wears these.
customer_reviews.author: SteveJunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great product. If you need to supply a team of young people, these are a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde A. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Good guards for use under socks
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my 5 year old. We actually cut the straps off because they seemed unnecessary. The ankle strap was too long and the calf strap wasn't long enough. But if you put them under socks you don't need straps anyway. If you are looking for a pair to go over the top of the socks these might not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shin pads. Need to make sure your child wears them with the long soccer socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lady In Red

customer_reviews.title: Bad fitv and lousy straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps were easy over-sized. The velcro was maybe an inch long and very narrow. My son is 6 and these were described add being a decent fit. Not only did they not fit because of the long straps but the velcro would barely stick together. Very underwhelming. Just a tiny bit of extra effort on the straps and these works have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: rubensd

customer_reviews.title: They have been using them perfectly like that.
customer_reviews.text: A little to big for my boys(7 & 9 year old), I had to cut out the straps bc they were unconformable (too long for their leg size). They have been using them perfectly like that... :P
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: TINY
customer_reviews.text: Reeaaallllyyyy small. like, tiny small... my 10 year old daughter (who is the smallest kid in her class) couldn't even get the over her foot. the hard shin guard part was smaller than my hand (average sized women's hand). Plus, the ankle sock thing is sewn onto the foam on the inside of the plastic guard piece, so the smallest tug naturally rips it. bad design
customer_reviews.author: selmores

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 5yo perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 5yo perfectly. They wear a 5/6 usually and these were a perfect match for their shins.
customer_reviews.author: Kayde House

customer_reviews.title: Serves their purpose
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about shin guards? I got these for my 7-year old boys. They do what their supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: zoey.fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit my 11.5 years old but too big for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: THEY are great! Bought for my 7 yr old twins and ...
customer_reviews.text: THEY are great! Bought for my 7 yr old twins and 8 yr old boy. They are very happy. They say theae shin guards are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Daetz Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for my little
customer_reviews.text: If you need shin guards these will guard your shins.
customer_reviews.author: J-M

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used for arm guards for protection while training a Macaw. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: carol moran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves these and seems to protect him.
customer_reviews.author: falguni

customer_reviews.title: Weak stitching in the ankle area
customer_reviews.text: The ankle padding ripped off on the very first use. It is still hanging on by a little, but we needed to keep using them, for his games and practices. Only 1 ripped, the other one is fine. They looked too small when we unpackaged them, but turned out they fit my skinny 8 year old just fine. Just wish we could get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: d.robinson

customer_reviews.title: velcro design is poor, causing it to scratch the calf
customer_reviews.text: These are massive on our 4 year old, and they won't stay in place or even velcro in place. Had to use socks just to keep them on, and they shifted around constantly. Also, velcro design is poor, causing it to scratch the calf. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wisdomseeker2

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: These say they are for up to 12 year olds problem is they wouldn't fit a Barbie doll...........they wouldn't fit my ten year old................................they are the size of my palm
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Karaffa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my son. Surprised how nice they were for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vrod

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 9 year old son perfectly. Wonderful value (about $6 per set) My son prefers the guards without straps so these are just what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Miss CC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer, not a unicorn battle
customer_reviews.text: Bought em for average height 4yo son. Fit very good and no complaints while wearing them I don’t think they would stand up to a kick from a crazed unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its great but the Velcro straps are big for my son
customer_reviews.author: Nis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Quality seems fine. Easier to put on than the ones that hook to socks.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the black for my 10 yr old and they are so small. Probably can fit my 4 yr old. Did not expect that at all. Will still keep because I hate doing the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Nice shin guards. Easy to put on. My 10 y.o. love them.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Spivak

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy or value
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, I’m not sure it’ll protect against repeated hits. Closure doesn’t feel secure (Velcro meets at the back of the calf) No ankle support/protection. Feels cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyC

customer_reviews.title: These are super small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nine year old and they were WAY too small. I gave them to my three year old who they fit quite well. These would really only be good for small children under five or so.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Bernard

customer_reviews.title: picture that states 2-pack is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Saw the picture that said it was a 2 pack and assumed it meant 2 pairs. This is not the case. There is only one pair.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Only for Pee Wees! Way too small! I ordered for an 8 year old. In my opinion they won’t fit any child who is larger than the averaged sized 4-5 years old and younger.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hogan

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them. Their other shin guards have straps that ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them. Their other shin guards have straps that go under the foot and they complain about the straps hurting their feet when they run. With these shin guards they are no straps under the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyj305

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Work great on my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Work great on my 9 year old. A little big for my skinny six- year -old
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect on my oversize 4 year old. They are easy to put on and they seemed to look comfortable on him.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish the Velcro was reversed....I’d its not lined up exactly the scratchy side is against your skin
customer_reviews.author: L. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product but just didn’t fit my little guy who’s on the tiny size
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on a 7 year old with short legs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: work as expected. easy to put on, wipes off easily :)
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shin pads for our little guy's first year playing soccer!
customer_reviews.author: libdsjt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product is a really good value. I bought for my daughter and they have worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Scott

customer_reviews.title: brought for daughter
customer_reviews.text: daughter plays footy and just joined a team so I seen these cheap price and prime delivery there perfect size for her and she loves them shes 12 and the large fitted
customer_reviews.author: Marion Barker

customer_reviews.title: Good shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for 8 yr old, has two comfortable velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bolesky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and protected
customer_reviews.text: The shin pads are a good size and comfortable width. It’s thinner than other brands but it still does the job so what does it matter. Easy to wash and keep clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: My son is excited. Otherwise he always had some that were closed with Velcro. If he trained without a sock, they always opened and slipped. That is why we have now tried these. They fit perfectly and don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY EMOGHENE

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 years old. She’s in the 90th percentile for height and is wearing 8-9 clothes. These were way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Rana Najjar

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My boy love it.We use it outside socks and find that it will be more easier for my little kid to take on and off and it just cover the area needed.Without worry about hurting his knee when running across the field.Very happy for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Peters

customer_reviews.title: Would buy something else
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. The straps on the shin guards are too loose. My child complained the straps were itchy as well.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: The description said 11 inches but these are just at 7 inches. I would not recommend buying unless it’s for a child under 4.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hyder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap velcro doesn't last long.  FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Velcro gets weak after a few uses and so the straps start coming loose. GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: JakeBlade

customer_reviews.title: Stitching came apart in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The bottom straps are too loose, and the stitching on velcro came apart after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the size chart and these fit great in the front but the Velcro is way to big. You can see the Velcro on the bottom isn’t nearly has big as the top. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Velcro straps are way too small
customer_reviews.text: The guards are not designed to fit a regular size 7 year old. A few pennies of 1-2in of velcro in the straps could have solved this problem. Not happy. Most likely they will end up in the bin
customer_reviews.author: Walter Murguia

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice shin guards but they run larger than regular ones
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old wore these for 2 practices before the strap on the bottom of one completely broke, making them totally useless. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn AB

customer_reviews.title: Small Fit
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a small fit and the straps broke after 4 games. Went out and bought Umbra brand replacements after this.
customer_reviews.author: kfl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are falsely represented. They are not youth size. They are child size. My 11 year old daughter is only 4’7” and this are too small for her!
customer_reviews.author: Brad A.

customer_reviews.title: Itchy velcro
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and too big for my 6 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Product was much smaller than anticipated. Would fit my 5 year old well but purchased for my 8 year old and far too small for his height.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: For bigger kids- they aren’t adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: They slip around and have no room for adjustment in the straps. These didn’t work for my 7 year olds skinny legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Youth shin guards, said to fit up to 14 years of age, were very small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are too loose, but good otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old for soccer. They provide good coverage and seem sturdy. The only problem is that the straps are too loose for his legs and where the velcro is placed meant he was complaining that it itches when moving around. We resolved it by getting some stick on Velcro patches so that we can attach the straps tighter, so something to keep in mind if your kid is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First use out of the package came apart. Oh well should've spent a little more!!
customer_reviews.author: John Carden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for 10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my daughter who is size 10/12, and the other for my son size 5t. The shin pads worked for the 5 year old, but were way too small for the 10/12 size, so I returned hers.
customer_reviews.author: Tesha Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer soccer on weekends
customer_reviews.text: Pro: less annoying than typical shin guards. Good for toddlers who have soccer on Saturday mornings for eight weeks. Con: the little holes which are meant to make the shin guards breatheable are not cut out properly. The die cut machine or whatever didn't cut the holes properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Description misleading. Designed for maybe up to a 7 year old. Very small.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda Boutcher

customer_reviews.title: Peewee size- NOT 6-12 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my 6 year old's peewee size Wilson brand shin guards. See picture for size comparison. Left is peewee. Right is the new elemart shin guard. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: only for very small children
customer_reviews.text: for very little kids. made of Styrofoam. My 10 year old needs the real shin guards, which are plastic and larger
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: My son lost a strap the first practice, but they were replaced. We have had no issues with the replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These are Very Tiny, More PeeWee size than Youth. Thankfully I was able to use them for something else. But definitely smaller than advertised these would be perfect for a small 3-4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McMann

customer_reviews.title: Small, netter for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: These are very small, seem more appropriate for a toddler. Also, wasn't allowed to use for field hockey as she needed ones with ankle guards. Price so cheap didn't bother returning
customer_reviews.author: Rubydoo67

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. They serve their purpose. However the Velcro come apart wile my boys are running.
customer_reviews.author: Santillan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shin guards are good. One improvement would be to make longer straps.
customer_reviews.author: lisa_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom Velcro is too big for a child’s leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap, but they'll work fine
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, but kind of cheap. I was a little disappointed when I saw a nicer pair for the same price at a major retailer.
customer_reviews.author: C.

product_meta.title: ActionEliters Youth Soccer Shin Pad Shin Guards,Lightweight and Breathable Child Calf Protective Gear Soccer Equipment for 5-12 Years Old Boys Girls Children Teenagers
feature_bullets: Ergonomic Streamline Design - ActionEliters Youth Soccer Shin Guards are shaped well to lower legs and won’t give legs extra pressure and the Shin guards do not shift while game playing, Great for teenagers, children, kids, boys, girls etc.

Adjustable Elastic Sleeves - All ActionEliters shin pad fit for age 5-12 years old(free size). The shin board crafted with a durable & flexible band, easily fit the size flexibly; the child soccer pads are more stable for long time wearing, nice and safe for kids to do training and soccer games. Easy to use - just cover your shin with this pad and put on your socks.

Comprehensive Protection - ActionEliters shin guards have highly protective hard PP front boards which are lightweight, durable and can offer the shin and calf comprehensive protection against violent impacts.

Adjustable Elastic Sleeves - Different size for age 4-16 years old. The shin board crafted with a durable & flexible band, easily fit the size flexibly; the child soccer pads are more stable for long time wearing, nice and safe for kids to do training and soccer games. Easy to use - just cover your shin with this pad and put on your socks.

Lightweight & Comfortable - The powerful soccer training shin guards are created with high strength PP shell, which helps reducing impact on leg bones and muscle effectively; the soccer shin guards' EVA backing for high comfort and durable cushioning. Youth Soccer Shin Guards have the highly protective hard front plates which are lightweight, durable and can offer the shin & calf comprehensive protection to against impacts.
